errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that Lhotse only supports Python 3.7, while it actually supports version 3.7 and later.
correction_candidates: Lhotse supports Python version 3.7 and later.
errors.golden_answer: Lhotse supports Python version 3.7 and later.

errors.error_description: The development installation instructions list the installation and directory change commands before the `git clone` command, which is logically incorrect as the repository must be cloned first before changing into its directory and installing dependencies.
correction_candidates: First `cd lhotse` and `pip install -e '.[dev]'`, then `git clone https://github.com/lhotse-speech/lhotse`.
First, clone the repository with `git clone https://github.com/lhotse-speech/lhotse`, then `cd lhotse` and run `pip install -e '.[dev]'`.
First `pip install -e '.[dev]'`, then `git clone https://github.com/lhotse-speech/lhotse` and `cd lhotse`.
First `git clone https://github.com/lhotse-speech/lhotse`, then `pip install -e '.[dev]'` and `cd lhotse`.
errors.golden_answer: First, clone the repository with `git clone https://github.com/lhotse-speech/lhotse`, then `cd lhotse` and run `pip install -e '.[dev]'`.
